description:
Can’t reach your phone, but need to ask Siri™ or Google a question? For the first time ever, you can ask your Garmin. Updated with a speaker and microphone, the Venu 2 Plus merges the power of a smartwatch, with a GPS-based activity tracker. When not answering calls, questions, or pumping your workout playlist, it's loaded with tech to tell you more about how your train. The Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor provides data to track calories, stress levels, sleep quality and training efficiency. The GPS and altimeter record speed and distance, and make sure you get credit for any stairs climbed. During personal time, built-in breathing exercises help you relax. And through the free Connect app, you can review activities, customize and share workouts, track your fitness and much more.

  • Microphone for access to your smartphone voice assistant (Siri, Google Assistant or Bixby), for questions, calendar updates, texting, and more
  • Take and make calls from your wrist through your paired phone
  • Integrated speaker means you are no longer dependant on paired earphones to play music or hear your calls
  • 3cm AMOLED colour display has deep blacks and vibrant colours making it crisp and clear in any light
  • Intuitive widgets display needed metrics
  • Activity animations show proper form for strength training, cardio, Pilates and yoga with more than 40 structured workouts. And, more than 1600 exercise animations in the Connect app, so you can develop your own personalized workouts
  • 25+ activity modes, including: hiking, biking, running (with VO2 Max and cadence data), HIIT (AMRAP, EMOM, Tabata and more), walking, swimming (indoor only with stroke detection and SWOLF), strength training (with rep counting and targeted muscle mapping), yoga, Pilates and more
  • Robust golfing support: yardage, hazards, dog legs plus digital scorecard
  • Breathwork mode helps you relax and focus
  • Respiration tracking counts breaths per minute asleep, awake, during yoga or in a breathwork exercise
  • Garmin Coach personalized training plans: 5k, 10k, or just train smarter
  • Move IQ intelligently detects any activity to record all your daily exercise, from spin class to taking the stairs
  • Listen to music on your watch or over Bluetooth®, download playlists and podcasts via music services (Spotify®, Amazon Music or Deezer. Premium account may be required)
  • Playlists synced from streaming services update when in range of Wi-Fi
  • Holds up to 650 songs
  • Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels to aid training. See what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food)
  • Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment (if supported by your bank)
  • LiveTrack™ during activities (through a connected phone) allows you to share your location and fitness data
  • Incident detection uses your phone to send an emergency alert or call your contacts, letting them know you need help and exactly where you are via GPS, it even starts a LiveTrack, so they will be able to find you even if your location changes
  • Connects and caches 3 satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) for fast, strong connections nearly anywhere
  • Elevate™ 4.0 optical heart rate monitor has improved accuracy and twice the number of infrared sensors for more precise Pulse Ox data
  • Stress level score monitors heart rate variability while inactive
  • Menstrual tracking logs physical and emotional symptoms to aid training and nutrition during phases of your cycle
  • 24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle
  • Sleep score and advanced sleep tracking, monitors total sleep hours and periods of movement and restful sleep, providing an overall score and offering insights for improving your sleep
  • Automatically syncs with Garmin Connect app
  • Connects with ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart sensors, from foot pods, to speed and cadence pods (no power meters)
  • Connect IQ support for downloading apps, templates, data fields, watch faces, and more
  • Quick charge: powers an hour of running in a few minutes
  • Rechargeable battery: 8 hours with GPS and music, 24 hours in GPS mode or up to 9 days in smartwatch mode
  • Internal GPS provides basic waypoint navigation
  • Back to start feature directs you (as the crow flies) to starting point
  • Barometric altimeter tracks your ascent, descent and total elevation changes
  • Scratch-resistant Corning® Gorilla® Glass 3
  • Intuitive touchscreen and 3-button interface
  • Quick-release pins to change strap
  • In the box: Venu 2 Plus, charging cable and documentation
name: Garmin Venu 2 Plus
